name: Area 15
description:
You're an alien who crashlands in the middle of the city, fight your way out while repairing your ship and crafting guns.

Controls:

Aiming: Mouse

Shooting: LMB

Reloading: R

Moving: W, A, S, D

Switching guns: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 0 (if unlocked)

Crafting guns: C (while in contact with the ship)

Repairing the ship: F (while in contact with the ship)
